column1: L, Fox Host Sets Up Jason Miller To Mock Biden's 'Wipeout' On Air Force One, David, 2021-03-21,
column2: Fox News host and media critic Howard Kurtz on Sunday gave Trump adviser Jason Miller a chance to mock President Joe Biden for tripping while jogging up the stairs on Air Force One.
column3: I want to slip in one last question Kurtz said setting up Miller to slam Biden "which is Joe Biden tripped on the plane steps the other day got a lot of media derision for that. I'm sure since the press went haywire when Donald Trump had a little trouble was a little shaky walking down that ramp that you're going to say that this is a non-story and give Biden a break right?"
column4: Yeah something like that Miller replied as both men laughed. "But here's the thing. If Joe Biden can't even make it up the flight of stairs. I mean Howie it wasn't once it wasn't twice it was three times. And who knew that Stair Force One was going to be such a challenge for our current leader of the country."
column5: And now to see Joe Biden wipeout he added. "Karma is a you know what Howie. And I think for so many in the media who focused on President Trump and are completely ignoring what happened to Joe Biden just this week you know let's go and call it for what it is and Joe Biden just doesn't have the fortitude for this job."
column6: Alright Kurtz said. "I wouldn't overplay either incident but good to hear from you." For 16 years we have been exposing Washington lies and untangling media deceit.
